result.arabic_text: وَٱلَّذِينَ سَعَوۡاْ فِيٓ ءَايَٰتِنَا مُعَٰجِزِينَ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ أَصۡحَٰبُ ٱلۡجَحِيمِ
result.translation: (51) But the ones who strove against Our verses, [seeking] to cause failure[932] - those are the companions of Hellfire.
result.footnotes: [932]- i.e., trying to undermine their credibility and thereby defeat the Prophet (ﷺ).
